title: Tattoo 67
creator_credit: Yves Leduc, Michel Regnier, Clement Perron and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Highlights of the military spectacle that entertained Canadian audiences from coast to coast during Canada’s centennial celebrations, this major tribute of Canada’s armed forces took three years of preparation and involved over a thousand members. The three-hour program comprised parades and pageantry, historic tableaux, massed bands, drills and gymnastic displays. This film shows a little of each of the main events.
